tweet_text:
@notgriswold You think it’s a bad system because you enjoy the fruits stolen from others’ labor. It’s to your benefit. 

I make no claim to the practicality of an ‘easy solution’ (though destroying the state is a good start). But your desire to continue stealing doesn’t make it not stealing
